Sassy(apps, message, repo)

Sassy class.

Sassy.build_path(struct_name, dir_name)

Build a path based on structure name and a directory name.

Create a clean architecture structure.

Create a file and add content.

Sassy.delete_file(file)

Delete a file.

Create a directory.
